Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Well GenAI at least gave feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I have had one teacher give useful feedback at Monash. If feedback is given by teachers its usually way too late to be of any use and vague that it doesn't say why I got the grade and feels generic for everyone regardless of P or HD.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI can at least give instant and useful feedback.
